Package restaurant

Class TableManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • restaurant.TableManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class TableManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Controller class for Table objects that holds a collection of tables by table ID
    Author:
    Chen Xingyu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Table> tables
      a collection of all tables using HashMap.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TableManager()
      create a new Table Manager with an empty collection of tables

    • Field Detail

      • tables

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Table> tables
        a collection of all tables using HashMap. The HashMap stores table id and table object pairs

    • Constructor Detail

      • TableManager

        public TableManager()
        create a new Table Manager with an empty collection of tables

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(int id,
                Table t)
        add a table to table manager's collection
        Parameters:
        id - table ID
        t - the Table object to be added

      • remove

        public void remove​(int id)
        remove a table from table manager's collection
        Parameters:
        id - table ID

      • haveID

        public boolean haveID​(int id)
        check whether the ID provided is present in the collection of tables
        Parameters:
        id - table ID
        Returns:
        return true if the ID is inside the collection of tables, false otherwise

      • allocateTable

        public java.lang.Integer allocateTable​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> availTables,
                                       java.time.LocalDateTime time,
                                       int pax)
        find a table to allocate for dining in or making reservations
        Parameters:
        availTables - an ArrayList of table IDs that are available after being checked by ReservationManager about the reservations it has
        time - Table Manager will check each table's availability at given time
        pax - number of people dining
        Returns:
        return ID of the table being allocated, return null if no tables are available at the given time

      • assignTable

        public boolean assignTable​(int id)
        Assign the table with given ID by calling Table's assign() method if the table is available. Return false if the table is occupied now
        Parameters:
        id - table ID
        Returns:
        return true if the table is available and is successfully assigned, false if the table is occupied

      • vacateTable

        public void vacateTable​(int id)
        vacate the table after the customers have checked out by calling Table's vacate() method
        Parameters:
        id - table ID

      • listAllStatus

        public void listAllStatus()
        show status of all tables at the moment

      • checkTableStatus

        public boolean checkTableStatus​(int id)
        check whether the table with given id is available
        Parameters:
        id - table ID
        Returns:
        return false if the table is occupied at the moment, true if the table is available
